mapper.select: SELECT f.id as formId,f.formName,f.info, sl.id as labelId, sl.labelName labelName,f.createTime,u.headPortrait,f.cover, u.nickName creator,m.id musicId,m.name musicName,s.name singerName,s.id singerId, m.album,m.url musicUrl, (select count(fc.id) from form_collect fc where fc.formId=f.id) as collectNum, if(fc.id is null,0,1)as isCollect, if(ml.id is null,0,1)as isLike from form f left join form_details fd on f.id=fd.formId LEFT JOIN music m on fd.musicId=m.id left join form_label fl on f.id=fl.formId left join syslabel sl on sl.id=fl.labelId left join user u on f.userId=u.id left join singer s on m.singerId=s.id left join form_collect fc on f.id=fc.formId and fc.userId=#{userId} LEFT join music_like ml on m.id=ml.musicId and ml.userId=#{userId} where f.id=#{formId}

SELECT distinct f.id as formId,f.formName name,f.cover,u.nickName creator, f.issystem as isSystem, ((SELECT count(fc.id) FROM form_collect fc where fc.formId=f.id)+f.likenum)as hot from form f left JOIN `user` u on f.userId=u.id left join form_label fl on f.id=fl.formId WHERE f.online=1 and fl.labelId=#{labelId} order by hot desc limit #{offSet},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from ( SELECT f.id from form f left join form_label fl on f.id=fl.formId WHERE f.online=1 and fl.labelId = #{labelId} group by f.id) t
select s.id labelId,s.labelName from syslabel s
